1.0.0.name: wordpress/easy-post-types
1.0.0.description: This plugin lets you take advantage of the Wordpress 3.0 custom post type feature, and create your own post type. The plugin allows you to add a set of fields attached to your new post type, so that in the edit and add new windows a new box will show with the fields defined. Each field added will be saved in the Wordpress Database as a custom field, so that you can take advantage of the standard Wordpress query rules to list your content on the page template.
